title: Kim Kardashian spins all the plates as she pauses family trip for tech conference
text:
Kim Kardashian has packed a lot into her Armenia trip so far (Picture: Reuters)

Kim Kardashian really has packed a whole lot into her Armenia trip.

Not only did the 38-year-old find time to get her three youngest children, Saint, Chicago and Psalm, baptised in her family’s homeland, but she also made an appearance at the World Congress on Information Technology convention.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star was all kinds of glamorous as she hit the red carpet in Yerevan, before a chat about her growing beauty empire.

Proving she meant business, she rocked a strapless cream jumpsuit for the event, finishing the look in a matching blazer and Yeezy heels.

Clearly happy to be back in Armenia, she blew kisses to photographers before heading in for the talk.

This year’s WCIT sessions are all focusing on ‘the Power of Decentralisation: Promise and Peril’.

Kim is loving being in Armenia (Picture: Reuters)

She appeared at the annual World Congress on Information Technology (Picture: Reuters)

But it hasn’t been all work for the businesswoman, as she also took the opportunity to get Saint, Chicago and Psalm baptised, at the Etchmiadzin Cathedral, in Vagharshapat.

Advertisement

Advertisement

And before everyone starts kicking off, North wasn’t left out but was baptised, four years ago.

While Kanye hasn’t made the trip, Kim was joined by sister Kourtney, as well as her children Mason, Penelope and Reign, who also took part in the religious ceremony.

She got Saint, Chicago and Saint baptised at a church in Armenia (Picture: Instagram)

She gave fans a little glimpse into the ceremony, sharing a photo of the inside of the church on her Instagram story.

‘Holy Etchmiadzin, one of the most ancient Christian cathedrals in the world,’ she added for her 148million followers.

Kim and Kanye welcomed baby Psalm earlier this year, via a surrogate.

But the pair haven’t totally ruled out adding another two to their brood.

Yes, you read that right, we could be blessed with another two mini-Kimyes.

Lifting the lid on the Kardashian-West household, the KKW Beauty star said: ‘I feel like having four is so much more zen. I feel really calm and zen. I feel like they all love each other.

‘My two older kids would fight a little bit and now, since the baby’s here, everyone gets along…

‘I’m rolling with it. It just really is zen. It feels really equal and calm and great.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I would do even numbers…but I won’t, I won’t. I think that’s just like, I think I’ll go crazy. But I think four is the perfect, magic number for me.’

description: Kim Kardashian really has packed a whole lot into her Armenia trip, after speaking at a tech conference while on the family holiday
